LanguageData.Repair.Mcm.ResourceModeTip: Resources used to repair an item.
LanguageData.Repair.Mcm.RepairRateTip: How long it takes in ticks to repair 1 HP (60 ticks = 1 second).
LanguageData.Repair.Mcm.HpPerPackTip: How much total HP a kit repairs.
LanguageData.Repair.Mcm.SkillMultTip: Skill gain multiplier per HP repaired. This is base skill gain, not the numbers you see ingame (Default: 0.55).
LanguageData.Repair.Mcm.PercentModeTip: Kits repair a percentage of HP instead of a fixed amount.
